 General Transit Feed Specification   
 Transit land     
 Open Data 
 General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) 
   
 The Réseau de transport de Longueuil (RTL) schedules and routes are now available to anyone with Internet access, in General Transit Feed Specifications (GTFS) format (hyperlien:  https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs/reference ) 
   
 Terms of use 
 The RTL hereby grants you non-exclusive, limited and revocable use rights, to reproduce and to redistribute information pertaining to bus schedules and routes (information) in GTFS format, under the following terms: 
 The RTL retains all rights, titles and interests of any kind on the information, including, and without limiting the generality of the foregoing, its intellectual property rights embodied in the information, including any copyrights.  
   
 You acquire no rights from the use, the amendment or the distribution of the information. Commercial or quasi-commercial use of the information is not authorized under the terms of this agreement and requires RTL’s prior written authorization. 
   
 Any RTL official mark or any material protected by copyright cannot be used without RTL’s prior written authorization.  
   
 The information is provided to you on a “as is” basis. The RTL does not guarantee that the information is free from mistakes, errors or bugs, neither that they will be corrected, neither that its website will operate without interruptions or failures.  
   
 The RTL or its employees, will not, under any circumstances, be held responsible for any types of predictable or unpredictable damages (including loss of profits or loss of opportunity) arising from the use or the total or partial inability to use the information. 
   
 The RTL reserves the right to amend or to withdraw the information at any time without prior notice. 
 By downloading and using RTL’s information, you accept the terms and conditions set forth in this agreement. 
   
 The terms contained in this agreement replace any prior discussions, agreements or representations between the RTL and you, and can be amended only with RTL’s prior written authorization. 
   
 Due to unforeseen circumstances, all information pertaining to bus schedules and routes is subject to change without notice. 
   
 You must accept these terms and conditions in order to download the file. 
   
 Agree and Download GTFS
